backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, tour packages, and submission of tour and car‑rental inquiries with admin‑restricted management APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping deployment‑related requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Markdown describing the valid deployment slug and rules for platform‑managed deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main client script.
frontend/public/_redirects: Static hosting redirect file routing all paths to index.html for SPA fallback.
frontend/public/404.html: Custom 404 page loading the bundled SPA assets for client‑side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that restricts admin routes based on Internet Identity authentication and admin permission.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeContact: Renders a contact bar displaying phone, email, and MD details using icons and styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Provides a site footer with about text, quick links, social icons, contact info, and dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements a responsive header with navigation links, logo, mobile menu, and conditional admin/login elements.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout wrapping header, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/packages/Package: Displays a tour package card with title, description, duration, price, and link to details.
frontend/src/config/deployment.ts: Exports and validates a deployment slug ensuring platform rules and inclusion of 'blackrays'.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating packages, inquiries, and admin actions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes, plus global styles and a hero overlay component.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company intro, mission statement, and values displayed using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing quick links to manage packages and inquiries, displaying a welcome message.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin interface for viewing inquiries, updating their status, and handling loading or error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPackagesPa: Admin CRUD page for creating, editing, and deleting tour packages with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/CarRentalsPage.tsx: Implements a car rental booking form with validation, submission handling, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactInquiryPage.ts: Provides a contact inquiry form that submits user messages and displays corresponding success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the landing page with a hero section, contact bar, and quick car rental info cards.
frontend/src/pages/PackageDetailsPage.ts: Loads and displays detailed information for a selected travel package with error, loading, and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Public packages page that fetches and displays tour packages with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session storage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including goals, scalability notes, domain and notification issues, and a list of existing frontend, admin, and UX-related features. Serves as the master record for requirements and known constraints.
